text: Alvin Adolf Holmes (October 26, 1939 â€“ November 21, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Alabama House of Representatives from 1974 to 2018. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in Montgomery, Alabama. Holmes died on November 21, 2020, at the age of 81.Alvin Holmes, longtime outspoken Alabama legislator who fought for equality, dies ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Montgomery, Alabama Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Alvin Holmes
